creator: matthew@mjwilson.demon.co.uk
text:
The semantics of stylesheets in SVG are defined via the W3C note "Associating
Style Sheets with XML documents Version 1.0", which itself references HTML 4.0,
which (in summary) says that authors should be able to define a number of
different stylesheets for a document, and users should be able to choose their
preferred stylesheet.

http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/styling.html#ReferencingExternalStyleSheets
http://www.w3.org/TR/xml-stylesheet/
http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/present/styles.html#h-14.3.1

This would be useful functionality in Batik.

Created attachment 485
Proposed patch for the SVG viewer
creator: matthew@mjwilson.demon.co.uk
